title: Is a certificate of completion a degree? - Quora

response.answer_text: Not in my book … A diploma represents official verification from a school board that a specific person has completed the state-mandated minimum educational requirements wherever the diploma is granted. A certificate of completion is a different document certifying that a particular course of study or individual class has been completed. At least that is my understanding of the difference. Some school board somewhere might use the terms interchangeably. John
No. it is a certificate only. you can get a certification of completion in a number of courses that may only require a couple of weeks of classroom instruction.
